caption:
June is National Pride Month, a time to honor the impact LGBTQ+ people have had on the world, and especially in nursing.

It’s natural to think that treating all patients with the same respect will minimize the discrimination LGBTQ+ people face in healthcare settings, but that’s not always the case. 

LGBTQ+ people still face many barriers to receiving the optimal healthcare they deserve.

Here are 5 specific strategies for how you can help improve this community’s quality of care.
